results.content: Sec. 4: Product Management in Action was a brilliant and appropriate application of the preceding theory; you went in-depth in areas unique to product management, and skipped in areas that are more generic such as coding/test. Thank you.

response.content: Thanks Jacob! Glad that you liked the course. Please do share with your friends/peers who could benefit as well. Also, if you have any questions/clarifications, please feel free to reach out.

results.content:
The course is very engaging and Instructor has covered most and major points in the course. This course is great for taking and revising at the time when you feel a need of brushing up Product management strategies.
Also the case assignment and Product in-course review and go through makes the big picture very clear and concise.
results.content_html:
The course is very engaging and Instructor has covered most and major points in the course. This course is great for taking and revising at the time when you feel a need of brushing up Product management strategies.
Also the case assignment and Product in-course review and go through makes the big picture very clear and concise.

results.content: I learned more than I thought I would, which is definitely a plus. I will keep referring back to some of these lectures to improve on my skills and apply them in my career. Product Management in Action section is very informative and useful, can relate/apply easily to any real-time features.
